snippet: KLAIF--Arthur M. was born to Nathan and Mollie Klaif in NYC on October 7, 1921. He is survived by his children Sharon Klaif Dyball and Mitchell Klaif, and grandchildren Rennie Dyball Krajnak, Nicholas Dyball, Morgan Klaif, Brian Klaif and Kelly Klaif, and great-grandchild Kady Dyball Krajnak. He is also survived by his loving companion Felice Wiener. He was married to Pepi Kleinwaks (deceased) and Madeline Kleinwaks Klaif (deceased). A longtime resident of Maplewood, New Jersey he passed away at his home in NYC on Sunday, February 28th. Arthur was a special person who will be deeply missed by all who knew him. 1/3
